description: In this game you need to beat track records in all 6 parts of the planet to earn title of the world champion. You will face hard turns, fast straits and incredible jumping ramps. Upgrade your car and see immediate changes in its look. So what are you waiting for? Get into one of the buggies and become the greatest Buggy Racer!
name: Buggy Racer
intro: Become a legendary driver and the fastest in the whole world. Unforgettable adventure full of drifts, jumps and nitrous oxide!
